message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $250?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a savvy negotiator. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we discuss $180?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $160?
I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $175?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short. I'd be willing to go up to $165, but that's as high as I can go. Would you consider meeting me at that price?
I appreciate your honesty, Bob. I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to make one last concession. How about we meet at $170?
